titleInfo.title: Portrait of Peryle Hayutin on Her Sixteenth Birthday

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 9.5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photographic print: '' Peryle Hayutin, Confirmation BMH 1930, #465.''

mods.abstract: Peryle Hayutin (Beck) with her hair in long curls stands in front of a piano that has vases of flowers on it. This portrait was taken for her sixteenth birthday. She was also confirmed at Beth Ha-Medrosh Hagodol Synagogue (BMH) on that date. She wears a white dress with a sheer full length overdress.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 99.
Donated by Peryle Hayutin Beck in 1981.
